usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Launch with GPT-OSS-120B
usage.description: Get your AI SaaS startup running in three simple steps:

items.title: Get GPT-OSS-120B
items.description: Buy GPT-OSS-120B with a one-time payment. Check your email for the code and documentation.

items.title: Start Your Project
items.description: Read the documentation and clone the code of GPT-OSS-120B. Start building your AI SaaS startup.

items.title: Customize Your Project
items.description: Modify the template with your data and contents. Specific AI functionality needs.

items.title: Deploy to Production
items.description: Deploy your project to production with a few steps and start serving customers immediately.

feature.name: feature

feature.description: Everything you need to launch your AI SaaS startup quickly and efficiently.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About GPT-OSS-120B
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What exactly is GPT-OSS-120B and how does it work?
items.description: GPT-OSS-120B is a comprehensive NextJS boilerplate designed specifically for building AI SaaS startups. It provides ready-to-use templates, infrastructure setup, and deployment tools that help you launch your AI business in hours instead of days.

items.title: Do I need advanced technical skills to use GPT-OSS-120B?
items.description: While basic programming knowledge is helpful, GPT-OSS-120B is designed to be developer-friendly. Our templates and documentation make it easy to get started, even if you're not an expert in AI or cloud infrastructure.

items.title: What types of AI SaaS can I build with GPT-OSS-120B?
items.description: GPT-OSS-120B supports a wide range of AI applications, from content generation to data analysis tools. Our templates cover popular use cases like AI chatbots, content generators, image processing apps, and more.

items.title: How long does it typically take to launch with GPT-OSS-120B?
items.description: With GPT-OSS-120B, you can have a working prototype in hours and a production-ready application in hours. Our one-click deployment and pre-configured infrastructure significantly reduce the traditional months-long development cycle.

items.title: What's included in the GPT-OSS-120B infrastructure?
items.description: GPT-OSS-120B provides a complete infrastructure stack including authentication, database setup, API integration, payment processing, and scalable cloud deployment. Everything is pre-configured following industry best practices.

items.title: Can I customize the templates to match my brand?
items.description: Absolutely! All GPT-OSS-120B templates are fully customizable. You can modify the design, features, and functionality to match your brand identity and specific business requirements while maintaining the robust underlying infrastructure.
